example.text: When Title 42 ends tomorrow, the preventable crisis at our southern border will accelerate. Today, I joined a letter to [[user]] demanding answers on this administration's ongoing failure to secure the border and finish the border wall. [[url]] [[url]]
My colleagues on both sides of the aisle should join me. I yield the floor.
Exciting news – this week, the [[user]] announced the launch of its Broadband Funding Map. [[user]] and I secured an amendment in the 2021 infrastructure law to create this important tool. [[url]]

Since October, border agents have arrested another 53 people on the terror watch list. President Biden's mismanagement of the border has created a total catastrophe, and thanks to him, we are experiencing not only a homeland security crisis but also a homeland defense crisis.

When Title 42 ends tomorrow, the preventable crisis at our southern border will accelerate. Today, I joined a letter to [[user]] demanding answers on this administration's ongoing failure to secure the border and finish the border wall. [[url]] [[url]]

The Mexican cartels. When we cannot control who is entering our country, when we cannot control what they are bringing into our country or where they are going, that is a serious national security risk.

I have also helped to introduce legislation that would require Presidential administrations to consult with States and to consult with stakeholders before they impose these restrictions on our State-owned natural resources. This is essential.
